page.description: The .PASTE() method pastes from the clipboard into the RTF object at the cursor location.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example pastes text into an RTF field in an open form.
section.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") obj.rtf.select(1,10) obj.rtf.cut() obj.rtf.paste()
